creator: mgainty@hotmail.com
text:
"[javac] javac: invalid flag: -sourcepath"
Java_Home set correctly
JAVACMD set correctly
only 1 tools.jar and the javac.exe is correct
Why is it pathing to the wrong compiler?

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
You seem to be invoking a 1.1 javac while running in a 1.2 (or higher) Java
virtual machine.  Are you forking javac?  Is a 1.1 classes.zip on your CLASSPATH
(maybe via Visual Cafe or something)?
